result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon D. Hervey

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor
Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Brandon D. Hervey
Current: 6300 Birch Street #153, Schofield, WI 54476 United States  (Effective: 10-19-2022)
Prior: 319 N. 4th St., Wausau, WI 54403 United States

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  2:55 p.m. 
INCLUDES 19CF1164, 22CF941.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Jessica Phelps (19CF1164 only).  

Date and time set for warrant quash; VRCW.  
Atty Phelps advises she does not represent him on 22CF941.
Atty Phelps advises of defendant's missed appearance last week for motion hearing and voluntary appearance in Branch 3 last week. 
Atty Phelps requests bond revert back to original $5,000.00 cash bond in 19CF1164.  
COURT questions deft re: where he resides.  
Defendant makes statement.  

COURT warns defend to update address.  
ADA Zibolski takes no position on bond. 

COURT reinstates bonds as they were originally; $2000.00 signature bond in 22CF941 and $5000.00 cash bond in 19CF1164.. 

COURT removes BFH:  10/31/22 at 8:30 a.m. 

COURT sets CC 10/26/22 at 8:05 a.m. 

Atty Phelps addresses representation on 22CF941; was court appointed on older cases due to SPD issues in finding counsel. 
COURT questions deft re: income/employment; Defendant makes statement. 
COURT appoints Atty Phelps on 22CF941 and caps fees at $2000.00.  

Adj:  3:00 p.m. 

Branch 4.

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon D. Hervey
Current: 319 N. 4th St., Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 10-14-2022)
Prior: 319 N. 4th St., Wausau, WI 54403

INCLUDES 19CF1164 & 22CF941.  No contact with victim(s): D.L.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents.   Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Micki. 
Case Called: 2:49 p.m. 
INCLUDES 19CF1164 and 22CF941

State appears by ADA Rory McGarry for ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in person, pro se. 

Date and time set for hearing. 
**COURT QUASHES WARRANT**

COURT questions defendant re: missed appearance. Defendant makes statement. 
ADA McGarry requests $5,000.00 cash bond on both files. 
With the following conditions:
- No contact with victim(s): D.L.
- No Bars, Taverns, Beer Tents or Liquor Stores
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  
Defendant makes statement regarding bond. 

COURT ORDERS: $5,000.00 cash bond on both files. With the following conditions:
- No contact with victim(s): D.L.
- No Bars, Taverns, Beer Tents or Liquor Stores
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Remanded to the Sheriff's Department.

Hearing - 10/17/22 at 2:45 p.m.
BFH 10/31/22 at 8:30 a.m.

DEFENDANT'S ADDRESS: 319 N. 4th Street, Wausau, WI 54403.

Branch 4.

ADJ: 2:55 p.m.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  10:43 a.m. 
INCLUDES 19CF1164, 22CF941.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski. 
Defendant fails to appear. 
Atty Jessica Phelps appears in person.

Date and time set for motion hearing. 
COURT recites history re: motion to admit evidence (Doc 83) and was prepared to proceed. 
Atty Phelps has no information to provide Court on deft's absence. 
COURT notes proper notice was sent for today's hearing. 
State is requesting warrant. 

COURT issues $200.00 bench warrant and sets BFH for 10/31/22 at 8:30 a.m. 

Atty Phelps addresses trial date. 
ADA Zibolski requests trial be continued until BFH to see if deft appears. 
COURT agrees and will leave JT on calendar. 

Adj: 10:45 a.m.
Intake Report- Marathon County Pretrial Services  - Completed 08-02-2022
